position: Manager Service Associate at Randstad RiseSmart

experience.title: Sourcer
experience.description: iPlace is a global recruiting company with headquarters in Vienna, Virginia, USA and international recruiting center in Pune, Maharashtra, India.RESPONSIBILITY as Sourcer:- Executive search assignment for  fortune five hundred companies for top level (Sales Director, Program Manager, Account manager, Executive, Associate, System Engineers etc.,) requirements, Client Reporting, Client Relations, Active search and Passive search, Advert posting, Keyword Analysis, Advert web Optimization, Screening, Analysis and E-marketing.•	Successfully converted 2 client trial periods to full time contract.•	Worked on niche positions like Structural Engineers, Credit Controllers, Risk Management, lean management, vulnerability management and many more. •	Build good rapport with client and added new resources and earned revenue to my employer.•	Worked on job board like monster.USA, Dice, Hot jobs, and Career builder and utilized many free resources on free web. •	Extensively used professional networking sites and free resource tools to find candidates like linkedin.com, xing.com, jigsaw and zoom info.•	Single point of contact for clients and focus delivering and doing channel business development.
experience.description_html: iPlace is a global recruiting company with headquarters in Vienna, Virginia, USA and international recruiting center in Pune, Maharashtra, India.RESPONSIBILITY as Sourcer:- Executive search assignment for fortune five hundred companies for top level (Sales Director, Program Manager, Account manager, Executive, Associate, System Engineers etc.,) requirements, Client Reporting, Client Relations, Active search and Passive search, Advert posting, Keyword Analysis, Advert web Optimization, Screening, Analysis and E-marketing.• Successfully converted 2 client trial periods to full time contract.• Worked on niche positions like Structural Engineers, Credit Controllers, Risk Management, lean management, vulnerability management and many more. • Build good rapport with client and added new resources and earned revenue to my employer.• Worked on job board like monster.USA, Dice, Hot jobs, and Career builder and utilized many free resources on free web. • Extensively used professional networking sites and free resource tools to find candidates like linkedin.com, xing.com, jigsaw and zoom info.• Single point of contact for clients and focus delivering and doing channel business development.

experience.title: E-Recruitment Specialist
experience.description: OS2i has pioneered the oRPO offshore recruiting model to deliver world class RPORESPONSIBILITY as E – Recruitment Specialist:- Same as Above and more mentioned Below:-Experience in resume/CV sourcing for US and UK based Clients.• I have worked with the clients from the range of industries/sectors like like IT, Engineering, Sales and many other.• Sourcing from European and US Job-boards, Free Sites• Sending Reference mails to candidates and prequalifying them.• Working with Team to achieve Team Goals.• Delivering timely report.• Responsible for delivering resumes for different roles across to different clients.• Strong knowledge of sourcing candidates for different roles.
